comments:
Using WTP 3.0 M2 20070920 build

1. create an xml file
2. move cursor to "version" in <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
3. get a dialog box popup saying "An error has occurred."

Get the folowing exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.xml.ui.internal.tabletree.XMLTableTreeViewer$SelectionProvider.setSelection(XMLTableTreeViewer.java:116)
	at org.eclipse.wst.xml.ui.internal.tabletree.XMLMultiPageEditorPart$TextEditorPostSelectionAdapter.selectionChanged(XMLMultiPageEditorPart.java:234)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.StructuredTextEditor$6.run(StructuredTextEditor.java:907)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.StructuredTextEditor$StructuredSelectionProvider.fireSelectionChanged(StructuredTextEditor.java:905)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.StructuredTextEditor$StructuredSelectionProvider.handlePostSelectionChanged(StructuredTextEditor.java:963)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.StructuredTextEditor$5.selectionChanged(StructuredTextEditor.java:886)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.TextViewer.firePostSelectionChanged(TextViewer.java:2547)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.TextViewer.firePostSelectionChanged(TextViewer.java:2499)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.TextViewer$5.run(TextViewer.java:2478)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runTimer(Display.java:3805)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.messageProc(Display.java:3023)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.win32.OS.DispatchMessageW(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.win32.OS.DispatchMessage(OS.java:2317)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:3351)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:2389)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runUI(Workbench.java:2353)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.access$4(Workbench.java:2219)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench$4.run(Workbench.java:466)
	at org.eclipse.core.databinding.observable.Realm.runWithDefault(Realm.java:289)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.createAndRunWorkbench(Workbench.java:461)
	at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createAndRunWorkbench(PlatformUI.java:149)
Fixed.  There was an underlying assumption that having attribute text regions meant that the attribute named node map from the DOM node would not be null.
